item.title: EU leaders meet to talk defense but Trump and his tariffs loom large

item.title: Trump slaps tariffs on Mexico, Canada and China
item.description: U.S. President Donald Trump is pushing ahead with long-threatened import tariffs on goods from Canada, Mexico and China.

item.title: Ontario to remove U.S. alcohol from shelves after Trump's tariffs announcement
item.description: The Liquor Control Board of Ontario will remove American alcohol from its shelves in response to U.S. President Trump's tariffs on Canada.
